input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item features and item name information.

Item name:
3dRose DPP_211236_1 Peacock Feather on Turquoise Background Wall Clock, 10 x 10

Item features:
Dimensions (in inches): 10 H x 10 W x 0.1 D
High gloss mirror like finish, UV coated, scratch resistant aluminum; suitable for moist environment
Silent uncovered quartz mechanism. Requires one AA battery (not included)
Gold colored hour, minute and second hands
Numbers are printed as part of the image
Frameless clock design


Product description:
input_text.Response A: This wall clock will become an attractive feature in your home or office, while also providing a functional purpose. The clock is made of durable high grade aluminum. This clock has a high gloss mirror like, UV coated, scratch resistant finish and is suitable for a moist environment. Available in different sizes, requires one AA battery; not included. Battery box is not covered.
input_text.Response B: This elegant wall clock is a perfect addition to any room, featuring a beautiful peacock feather on a turquoise background. The clock is made of high gloss mirror-like finish, UV coated, scratch resistant aluminum, suitable for moist environment. The size of the clock is 10 x 10 and it requires one AA battery. The gold colored hour, minute and second hands add to the beauty of the clock. The numbers are printed as part of the image, making it easy to read. This wall clock is frameless and can be easily hung on any wall. It makes a perfect gift for any occasion.
